channel.title: HTML help!
channel.description:
Okay i was just wondering if anyone is any good at HTML.
I'm editing this template : http://www.zymic.com/show_templates.php?id=1&rowstart=40 Number 32
And i want to replace all of those link buttons with just something like this: http://img73.imageshack.us/img73/2922/bannerthingif7.png
If you want to help then download the template for the code and images.
Help would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: HTML help!
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

Aww, Darn. I wanted to help him xD…

Well if you need anymore help. You can always ask me

Read full topic

item.title: HTML help!
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

I LOL’D at its description.
A simple template with an easy to edit header.
“Easy to edit header :P”

OK now then, to business.

If you wanna sacrifice your shoutbox for your navigation, then here’s what you do:

replace (this should be right under )

[code]

    </tr>
    <tr> 
      <td rowspan=6> <img src="images/top_02.gif" width=347 height=91 alt=""></td>
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_03.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
      <td rowspan=6> <img src="images/top_04.gif" width=5 height=91 alt=""></td>
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_05.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
      <td rowspan=6> <img src="images/top_06.gif" width=5 height=91 alt=""></td>

      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_07.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
      <td rowspan=6> <img src="images/top_08.gif" width=5 height=91 alt=""></td>
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_09.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
      <td rowspan=6> <img src="images/top_10.gif" width=132 height=91 alt=""></td>
    </tr>
    <tr> 
      <td> <img src="images/top_11.gif" width=69 height=4 alt=""></td>

      <td> <img src="images/top_12.gif" width=69 height=4 alt=""></td>
      <td> <img src="images/top_13.gif" width=69 height=4 alt=""></td>
      <td> <img src="images/top_14.gif" width=69 height=4 alt=""></td>
    </tr>
    <tr> 
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_15.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_16.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>

      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_17.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_18.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
    </tr>
    <tr> 
      <td> <img src="images/top_19.gif" width=69 height=4 alt=""></td>
      <td> <img src="images/top_20.gif" width=69 height=4 alt=""></td>
      <td> <img src="images/top_21.gif" width=69 height=4 alt=""></td>

      <td> <img src="images/top_22.gif" width=69 height=4 alt=""></td>
    </tr>
    <tr> 
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_23.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_24.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_25.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>
      <td> <a href="#" target="iframe"><img src="images/top_26.gif" alt="" width=69 height=16 border="0"></a></td>

    </tr>
    <tr> 
      <td> <img src="images/top_27.gif" width=69 height=35 alt=""></td>
      <td> <img src="images/top_28.gif" width=69 height=35 alt=""></td>
      <td> <img src="images/top_29.gif" width=69 height=35 alt=""></td>
      <td> <img src="images/top_30.gif" width=69 height=35 alt=""></td>
    </tr>

  </table></td>
[/code]

replace that with

<img src="http://img73.imageshack.us/img73/2922/bannerthingif7.png" alt="GoateeGFX logo" name="logo" />

Read full topic
